message: Let's be fair and split the money almost evenly, Bob. This offer benefits us both.
I think we can do better than the last offer. I'm willing to give you a little less this time, but I'm hoping you'll consider accepting it. Time is running out, and we both want to get something.
Bob, let's stop wasting time. A 50/50 split is the fairest and ensures we both benefit.  The clock is ticking!
